rows.label: qev013902_MSG0001
rows.name:
I was the one spreading the word to the xenoforms!
I just hope they heard me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013902_MSG0002
rows.name:
Anyway, how about that Eliza, huh?
She's pretty amazing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013902_MSG0003
rows.name:
I'm totally sure she'll be the bridge that links us humans
with the xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013902_MSG0004
rows.name:
And really, what could be better than living in a world
where everybody treats each other as equals?
Nothing, that's what! Ab-so-lutely nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013902_MSG0005
rows.name:
Think about it! There'd be no more wars...
No more fights over petty, stupid things...[ST:wait ]
